nodes.text: Excursion was a roleplaying-game adventure in year three of the Living Force campaign. It was the second adventure in the Belted In trilogy and was written by Jae Walker and Morrie Mullins.

The heroes search the Cularin system asteroid belt for some missing Cularin Militia members. However, they instead discover a Thaereian military where the crew are all dead and a Metatheran Cartel mining facility, where all the cartel members have been killed and their bodies reanimated by shadow lurkers.
